// DataAccessComponent.js
import React,{useState}from"react";import Label from"./Label";import Input from"./Input";import Button from"./Button";import Modal from"./Modal";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DataAccessComponent=_ref=>{let{onDataAccess,onFetchData}=_ref;const[apiUrl,setApiUrl]=useState("");const[activeCampaignApiKey,setActiveCampaignApiKey]=useState("");const[showConfirmation,setShowConfirmation]=useState(false);const handleSyncButtonClick=()=>{if(apiUrl.trim()!==""&&activeCampaignApiKey.trim()!==""){onDataAccess(apiUrl,activeCampaignApiKey);onFetchData();}else{setShowConfirmation(true);}};const handleConfirmationCancel=()=>{setShowConfirmation(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{textAlign:"start"},children:"Authorize to Active Campaign"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inputs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Label,{htmlFor:"apiUrl",labelText:"Active Campaign API URL:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{id:"apiUrl",value:apiUrl,onChange:setApiUrl}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Label,{htmlFor:"activeCampaignApiKey",labelText:"Active Campaign API Key:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{id:"activeCampaignApiKey",value:activeCampaignApiKey,onChange:setActiveCampaignApiKey}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{margin:"0 auto"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleSyncButtonClick,children:"Authorize"})})]})}),showConfirmation&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal,{onCancel:handleConfirmationCancel,message:"All Fields are required!"})]});};export default DataAccessComponent;
